00047 SelfDoc CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::explainSelf()
00048     {
00049     CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection obj;
00050     SelfDoc doc;
00051     doc.setDocName(obj.getType());
00052     doc.setDocDescription(obj.getDescription());
00053     doc.setDocOptions(obj.getDefaultDocOptions());
00054     return doc;
00055     }

00057 /**
00058  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00059  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00060  */
00061 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::getDefaultDocOptions()
00062     {
00063     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00064 
00065     // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00066 
00067     SelfDoc::Opt dTrim = {"trim", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "2.0", "2.0", "NA", "NA", "Log2Ratio Trim value."};
00068     opts.push_back(dTrim);
00069 
00070     SelfDoc::Opt dPercentile = {"percentile", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.75", "0.75", "NA", "NA", "High Percentile value."};
00071     opts.push_back(dPercentile);
00072 
00073     SelfDoc::Opt iWaveCount = {"wave-count", SelfDoc::Opt::Integer, "6", "6", "0", "NA", "Number of waves to add to the reference."};
00074     opts.push_back(iWaveCount);
00075 
00076     SelfDoc::Opt bDemean = {"demean", SelfDoc::Opt::Boolean, "false", "false", "NA", "NA", "Demean the input to the SVD."};
00077     opts.push_back(bDemean);
00078 
00079 //    SelfDoc::Opt dCutoff = {"wave-cutoff", SelfDoc::Opt::Double, "0.000001", "0.000001", "0", "NA", "The cutoff for wave calculation."};
00080 //    opts.push_back(dCutoff);
00081 
00082     return opts;
00083     }

00086 /**
00087  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00088  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00089  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00090  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00091  *
00092  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00093  *
00094  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00095  */
00096 SelfCreate * CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::newObject(
00097     std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00098     {
00099     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00100     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00101     CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection* pMethod = new CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection();
00102     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00103 
00104     pMethod->m_dTrim = setupDoubleParameter("trim", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00105     pMethod->m_dPercentile = setupDoubleParameter("percentile", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00106     pMethod->m_iWaveCount = setupIntParameter("wave-count", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00107     pMethod->m_bDemean = setupBoolParameter("demean", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00108 //    pMethod->m_dWaveCutoff = setupDoubleParameter("wave-cutoff", strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00109 
00110     return pMethod;
00111     }

00164 /**
00165  * @brief Run the calculations.
00166  */
00167 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::run()
00168 {
00169     Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::run(...) start");
00170     bool bCNReferenceRun = true;
00171     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input"))
00172     {
00173         bCNReferenceRun = false;
00174         m_strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-input");
00175         // Create temp file
00176         TmpFileFactory tempFactory;
00177         tempFactory.setTmpdir(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-dir"));
00178         m_strTempFileName = tempFactory.genFilename_basic( "CNReference_", ".a5.tmp");
00179         m_pEngine->setOpt("temp-reference-file", m_strTempFileName);
00180     }
00181     else
00182     {
00183         m_strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-output");
00184         m_strTempFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file");
00185     }
00186     m_bCyto2 = true;
00187     m_strGroup = "Cyto2";
00188     m_strTsv = "MedianSignals";
00189     int iProbeSetCount = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(m_strReferenceFileName, m_strGroup, m_strTsv);
00190     if (iProbeSetCount <= 0)
00191     {
00192         m_bCyto2 = false;
00193         m_strGroup = "CopyNumber";
00194         m_strTsv = "Reference";
00195         iProbeSetCount = affx::File5_Tsv::getFileTsvLineCount(m_strReferenceFileName, m_strGroup, m_strTsv);
00196     }
00197     if (iProbeSetCount <= 0) {throw(Except("Cannot find any probe sets to process in the reference."));}
00198     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pProbeSets = new CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet[iProbeSetCount];
00199     AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet> vProbeSets;
00200     vProbeSets.reserve(iProbeSetCount);
00201     affx::File5_File file5;
00202     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00203     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00204     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5Waves = NULL;
00205     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5Covariates = NULL;
00206     file5.open(m_strReferenceFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00207     group5 = file5.openGroup(m_strGroup, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00208     AffxString str;
00209     int ii = 0;
00210     double d = 0;
00211     m_iRefWaveCount = 0;
00212     int iNumCovariates = 0;
00213     bool useCovariateTsv = m_pEngine->getEngineName() == "CNCytoEngine"  &&
00214                            group5->name_exists("Covariates");
00215 
00216     tsv5 = group5->openTsv(m_strTsv, affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00217     if (bCNReferenceRun)
00218     {
00219         if (useCovariateTsv)
00220         {
00221             tsv5Covariates = group5->openTsv("Covariates", affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00222             iNumCovariates = tsv5Covariates->getColumnCount(0);
00223         }
00224     }
00225     else {
00226         tsv5Waves = group5->openTsv("WaveCorrection", affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00227         m_iRefWaveCount = tsv5Waves->getColumnCount(0);
00228     }
00229     int iColumnCount = tsv5->getColumnCount(0);
00230     unsigned int uiIndex = 0;
00231     int iOrder = 0;
00232     while (tsv5->nextLine() == affx::FILE5_OK)
00233     {
00234         if (m_iRefWaveCount > 0) {tsv5Waves->nextLine();}
00235         if (iNumCovariates > 0) {tsv5Covariates->nextLine();}
00236         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = &pProbeSets[uiIndex];
00237         uiIndex++;
00238         p->Order = iOrder; iOrder++;
00239         tsv5->get(0, 0, &str); p->ProbeSetName = str;
00240         if (iColumnCount > 7)
00241         {
00242             tsv5->get(0, 7, &ii); p->Chromosome = (unsigned char)ii;
00243             tsv5->get(0, 8, &ii); p->Position = (unsigned int)ii;
00244         }
00245         tsv5->get(0, 1, &d); p->MedianSignal = (float)d;
00246         tsv5->get(0, 2, &d); p->XXMedianSignal = (float)d;
00247         tsv5->get(0, 3, &d); p->YMedianSignal = (float)d;
00248         p->Waves.resize(m_iRefWaveCount + m_iWaveCount);
00249         for (int iWaveIndex = 0; (iWaveIndex < m_iRefWaveCount); iWaveIndex++)
00250         {
00251             tsv5Waves->get(0, iWaveIndex, &d);
00252             p->Waves[iWaveIndex] = d;
00253         }
00254         if (iColumnCount > 9)
00255         {
00256             tsv5->get(0, 9, &ii);
00257             if ((ii != 1) && (ii != 3)) {
00258                 continue;
00259             }
00260         }
00261         if (iNumCovariates > 0)
00262         {
00263             p->ProcessFlag = (unsigned char)ii;
00264 
00265             // Assign iNumCovariates elements _exactly_
00266             p->AllCovariates.resize(iNumCovariates);
00267             std::vector<float>(p->AllCovariates).swap(p->AllCovariates);
00268 
00269             for (int iCovariateIndex = 0; iCovariateIndex < iNumCovariates; iCovariateIndex++)
00270             {
00271                 tsv5Covariates->get(0, iCovariateIndex, &d);
00272                 p->AllCovariates[iCovariateIndex] = d;
00273             }
00274         }
00275         vProbeSets.add(p);
00276     }
00277     tsv5->close();
00278     delete tsv5;
00279     if (m_iRefWaveCount > 0)
00280     {
00281         tsv5Waves->close();
00282         delete tsv5Waves;
00283     }
00284     if (iNumCovariates > 0)
00285     {
00286         tsv5Covariates->close();
00287         delete tsv5Covariates;
00288     }
00289 
00290     group5->close();
00291     delete group5;
00292     file5.close();
00293 
00294     vProbeSets.quickSort(1);
00295 
00296     unsigned int uiCelCount = 0;
00297     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input"))
00298     {
00299         uiCelCount = m_pEngine->getOptVector("cychps").size();
00300     }
00301     else
00302     {
00303         uiCelCount = m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
00304     }
00305     
00306     if (bCNReferenceRun == false && m_strSelectedQC != "") {Verbose::out(1, "Using selected-qc=" + m_strSelectedQC);}
00307 
00308     m_vAutosomeCV.resize(uiCelCount);
00309     calculateChromosomeStatistics(vProbeSets);
00310     for (int iWaveIndex = 0; (iWaveIndex < m_iWaveCount); iWaveIndex++)
00311     {
00312         loadPCALikeVector(m_strTempFileName, vProbeSets, iWaveIndex);
00313     }
00314 
00315     updateReference(vProbeSets, iProbeSetCount);
00316     if ((!bCNReferenceRun) && (!m_bKeepTempData))
00317     {
00318         Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"), false);
00319     }
00320 
00321     delete[] pProbeSets;
00322     Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::run(...) end");
00323 }
00324 
00325 void writeWaveCorrectionLog2Ratios(const string& dir, const string& name, AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets)
00326 {
00327   affx::File5_File file5;
00328   affx::File5_Group* group5;
00329   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00330 
00331   std::string analysisString = "analysis";
00332   std::string fileName = Fs::join(dir, analysisString, name);
00333 
00334   Verbose::out(3, "Writing Log2Ratios for " + fileName);
00335 
00336   try{
00337 
00338     file5.open(fileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN_CREATE);
00339     group5 = file5.openGroup("Signals", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00340     tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Signals", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00341     tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"ProbeSetName", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING,40);
00342     tsv5->defineColumn(0,1,"Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR);
00343     tsv5->defineColumn(0,2,"Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00344     tsv5->defineColumn(0,3,"Log2Ratio", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00345 
00346     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pProbeSet;
00347     for(int iProbeSetIndex=0;  iProbeSetIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iProbeSetIndex++)
00348     {
00349         pProbeSet = vProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00350         {
00351           tsv5->set_string(0,0, pProbeSet->ProbeSetName);
00352           tsv5->set_c(0,1, pProbeSet->getChromosome());
00353           tsv5->set_i(0,2, pProbeSet->Position);
00354           tsv5->set_f(0,3, pProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00355           tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00356         }
00357     }
00358 
00359     tsv5->close();
00360     delete tsv5;
00361     delete group5;
00362     file5.close();
00363   }
00364   catch(...){ throw(Except("Cannot open file " + fileName + " while attempting to dump intensities to file."));}
00365 }
00366 
00367 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::loadPCALikeVector(    const std::string& strTempFileName,
00368                                                             AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets,
00369                                                             int iWaveIndex)
00370 {
00371     Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::loadPCALikeVector(...) for wave " + ToStr(iWaveIndex));
00372     int iProbeSetCount = vProbeSets.size();
00373     unsigned int uiCelCount = 0;
00374     bool bCNReferenceRun = true;
00375     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input"))
00376     {
00377         bCNReferenceRun = false;
00378         uiCelCount = m_pEngine->getOptVector("cychps").size();
00379     }
00380     else
00381     {
00382         uiCelCount = m_pEngine->getOptVector("cels").size();
00383     }
00384     affx::File5_File file5;
00385     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
00386     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
00387     if (!bCNReferenceRun)
00388     {
00389         if (iWaveIndex == 0)
00390         {
00391             file5.open(strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00392             group5 = file5.openGroup("Signals", affx::FILE5_CREATE);
00393         }
00394         else
00395         {
00396             file5.open(strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00397             group5 = file5.openGroup("Signals", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00398         }
00399     }
00400     else
00401     {
00402         file5.open(strTempFileName, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00403         group5 = file5.openGroup("Intensities", affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00404     }
00405 
00406     std::vector<int> vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes;
00407     int iAutosomeProcessCount = Min(m_iAutosomeCount,(int)2e4);
00408     int iAutosomeStep = (int)::roundDouble((double)m_iAutosomeCount / (double)iAutosomeProcessCount);
00409 
00410     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex += iAutosomeStep)
00411     {
00412         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
00413         if (p->Chromosome <= m_iLastAutosomeChromosome)
00414         {
00415             vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes.push_back(iProbeSetIndex);
00416         } else {break;}
00417     }
00418     iAutosomeProcessCount = (int)vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes.size();
00419     if (iWaveIndex == 0)
00420     {
00421         m_vHasXX.resize(uiCelCount);
00422         m_vHasY.resize(uiCelCount);
00423         m_vYTargets.resize(uiCelCount);
00424         m_vPassedQC.resize(uiCelCount);
00425     }
00426     CNCychp cychp;
00427     CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* pv = NULL;
00428     AffxArray<CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber> v;
00429     AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet> vProbeSetsNameOrder;
00430     if (iWaveIndex == 0)
00431     {
00432         pv = new CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber[vProbeSets.getCount()];
00433         v.reserve(iProbeSetCount);
00434         vProbeSetsNameOrder.reserve(iProbeSetCount);
00435         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00436         {
00437             v.add(&pv[iProbeSetIndex]);
00438             vProbeSetsNameOrder.add(vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]);
00439         }
00440         vProbeSetsNameOrder.quickSort(0);
00441         m_uiPassedQCCount = uiCelCount;
00442     }
00443     if (bCNReferenceRun == false && m_strSelectedQC != "")
00444     {
00445         cychp.setSelectedQC(m_strSelectedQC);
00446     }
00447     Matrix mxAutosomes(iAutosomeProcessCount, m_uiPassedQCCount);
00448     unsigned int uiSampleIndex = 0;
00449     AffxString strCNReferenceInputFileName = "";
00450     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input")) {strCNReferenceInputFileName = Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-input"));}
00451     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00452     {
00453         Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::loadPCALikeVector(...) Step " + ToStr(iWaveIndex) + " Loading data " +ToStr(uiCelIndex + 1) + " of " + ToStr(uiCelCount));
00454         if (iWaveIndex == 0)
00455         {
00456             // Load up the signals, and calculate log2 ratios.
00457             if (bCNReferenceRun)
00458             {
00459                 double dA = 0;
00460                 double dB = 0;
00461                 int iColumnIndex = 0;
00462                 int rowIndex = -1;
00463                 tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Signals-" + ToStr(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00464                 for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00465                 {
00466                     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSetsNameOrder[iProbeSetIndex];
00467                     tsv5->nextLine();
00468                     while (p->Order != ++rowIndex)
00469                     {
00470                         if (p->Order < rowIndex) {Err::errAbort("Logical error in processing Signals-" + ToStr(uiCelIndex) + " - rowIndex > p->Order.");}
00471                         if (tsv5->nextLine() != affx::FILE5_OK) {Err::errAbort("Logical error in processing Signals-" + ToStr(uiCelIndex) + " - it has too few rows.");}
00472                     }
00473 
00474                     iColumnIndex = (uiCelIndex * 2);
00475                     tsv5->get(0, 0, &dA);
00476                     tsv5->get(0, 1, &dB);
00477                     double dSignal = (dA + dB);
00478                     double dLog2Ratio = 0;
00479                     if (p->Chromosome == m_iXChromosome)
00480                     {
00481                         dLog2Ratio = log2(dSignal / p->XXMedianSignal);
00482                     }
00483                     else if (p->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome)
00484                     {
00485                         dLog2Ratio = log2(dSignal / p->YMedianSignal);
00486                     }
00487                     else // Autosome
00488                     {
00489                         dLog2Ratio = log2(dSignal / p->MedianSignal);
00490                     }
00491                     p->Signal = dSignal;
00492                     p->Log2Ratio = dLog2Ratio;
00493                 }
00494                 tsv5->close();
00495                 delete tsv5; tsv5 = NULL;
00496 
00497                 covariateAdjustLog2Ratio(vProbeSets, uiCelIndex);
00498 
00499                 calibrateMedianAutosomeMedian(vProbeSets);
00500 
00501                 if (getEngine()->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00502                 {
00503                     string fileName = Fs::basename(getEngine()->getOptVector("cels")[uiCelIndex]) + ".wave" + ::ToStr(iWaveIndex) + ".a5";
00504                     ::writeWaveCorrectionLog2Ratios(getEngine()->getOpt("out-dir"), fileName, vProbeSets);
00505                 }
00506 
00507                 bool bXX = false;
00508                 bool bY = false;
00509                 calculateXY(vProbeSets, iProbeSetCount, bXX, bY);
00510                 m_vHasXX[uiCelIndex] = bXX;
00511                 m_vHasY[uiCelIndex] = bY;
00512                 m_vYTargets[uiCelIndex] = 0;
00513                 m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = true;
00514             }
00515             else
00516             {
00517                 cychp.readFile(m_pEngine->getOptVector("cychps")[uiCelIndex], v, true, true);
00518                 if ((!m_bForce) && (Fs::basename(cychp.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName()) != strCNReferenceInputFileName))
00519                 {
00520                     group5->close();
00521                     delete group5;
00522                     file5.close();
00523                     Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"), false);
00524                     Err::errAbort("The CN reference used to generate the CYCHP file does not match the cn-reference-input file name.\tCYCHP CN reference = " + Fs::basename(cychp.getCychpHeader().getCNReferenceFileName()));
00525                 }
00526                 if ((!m_bCyto2) && (uiCelIndex == 0))
00527                 {
00528                     vProbeSets.quickSort(0);
00529                     v.quickSort(0);
00530                 }
00531                 Verbose::out(1, "Gender\t" + cychp.getCychpHeader().getGenderAsString());
00532                 for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00533                 {
00534                     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p1 = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
00535                     CNCychpProbeSetsCopyNumber* p2 = v[iProbeSetIndex];
00536                     if (p1->ProbeSetName != p2->getProbeSetName())
00537                     {
00538                         group5->close();
00539                         delete group5;
00540                         file5.close();
00541                         Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("temp-reference-file"), false);
00542                         Err::errAbort("Probe Set sets mismatch between CN reference and CYCHP file.");
00543                     }
00544                     p1->Log2Ratio = p2->getLog2Ratio();
00545                     p1->Chromosome = p2->getChromosome();
00546                     p1->Position = p2->getPosition();
00547                 }
00548                 if ((!m_bCyto2) && (uiCelIndex == 0))
00549                 {
00550                     vProbeSets.quickSort(1);
00551                     v.quickSort(1);
00552                 }
00553 
00554                 m_vHasXX[uiCelIndex] = (cychp.getCychpHeader().getXX());
00555                 m_vHasY[uiCelIndex] = (cychp.getCychpHeader().getY());
00556                 m_vYTargets[uiCelIndex] = cychp.getCychpHeader().getYTarget();
00557                 m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = true;
00558                 if (m_bCyto2)
00559                 {
00560                     if ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getMAPD() > m_dCNQCCutoff) || (cychp.getCychpHeader().getPVQC() < m_dSNPQCCutoff))
00561                     {
00562                         m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = false;
00563                         Verbose::out(1, "CNQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getMAPD(), 6) + ", SNPQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getPVQC(), 6) + ", CYCHP file failed QC.");
00564                         m_uiPassedQCCount--;
00565                     }
00566                     else
00567                     {
00568                         Verbose::out(1, "CNQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getMAPD(), 6) + ", SNPQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getPVQC(), 6) + ", CYCHP file passed QC.");
00569 
00570                         if (m_bUseHighWavinessSegCount)
00571                         {
00572                             if ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() <= m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) && (cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() != -1))
00573                             {
00574                                 m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = false;
00575                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is <= " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ", expecting wavy samples only, this sample is skipped because it is non-wavy.");
00576                                 m_uiPassedQCCount--;
00577 
00578                             }
00579                             else
00580                             {
00581                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is > " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ".");
00582                             }
00583                         }
00584                         else
00585                         {
00586                             if ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() > m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) && (cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() != -1))
00587                             {
00588                                 m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = false;
00589                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is > " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ", expecting non-wavy samples only, this sample is skipped because it is wavy.");
00590                                 m_uiPassedQCCount--;
00591 
00592                             }
00593                             else
00594                             {
00595                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is <= " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ".");
00596                             }
00597                         }
00598                     }
00599                 }
00600                 else
00601                 {
00602                     if ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getMAPD() > m_dCNQCCutoff) || ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getCQC() != -1) && (cychp.getCychpHeader().getCQC() < m_dSNPQCCutoff)))
00603                     {
00604                         m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = false;
00605                         Verbose::out(1, "CNQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getMAPD(), 6) + ", SNPQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getCQC(), 6) + ", CYCHP file failed QC.");
00606                         m_uiPassedQCCount--;
00607                     }
00608                     else
00609                     {
00610                         Verbose::out(1, "CNQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getMAPD(), 6) + ", SNPQC = " + ::getDouble(cychp.getCychpHeader().getCQC(), 6) + ", CYCHP file passed QC.");
00611 
00612                         if (m_bUseHighWavinessSegCount)
00613                         {
00614                             if ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() <= m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) && (cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() != -1))
00615                             {
00616                                 m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = false;
00617                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is <= " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ", expecting wavy samples only, this sample is skipped because it is non-wavy.");
00618                                 m_uiPassedQCCount--;
00619 
00620                             }
00621                             else
00622                             {
00623                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is > " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ".");
00624                             }
00625                         }
00626                         else
00627                         {
00628                             if ((cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() > m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) && (cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount() != -1))
00629                             {
00630                                 m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] = false;
00631                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is > " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ", expecting non-wavy samples only, this sample is skipped because it is wavy..");
00632                                 m_uiPassedQCCount--;
00633 
00634                             }
00635                             else
00636                             {
00637                                 Verbose::out(1, "WavinessSegCount " + ::getInt(cychp.getCychpHeader().getWavinessSegCount()) + " is <= " + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff) + ".");
00638                             }
00639                         }
00640                     }
00641                 }
00642                 // Subtract the y-target (first wave only)
00643                 for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00644                 {
00645                     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
00646                     if (p->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome && m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex] && m_vHasY[uiCelIndex])
00647                     {
00648                         p->Log2Ratio -= m_vYTargets[uiCelIndex];
00649                     }
00650                 }
00651                 m_vYTargets[uiCelIndex] = 0;
00652             }
00653         }
00654         else
00655         {
00656             float f = 0;
00657             affx::File5_Tsv* ptsv5 = group5->openTsv("Log2Ratios-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00658             for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00659             {
00660                 CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
00661                 ptsv5->nextLine();
00662                 ptsv5->get(0, 0, &f);
00663                 p->Log2Ratio = f;
00664             }
00665             ptsv5->close();
00666             delete ptsv5;
00667 
00668             adjustLog2Ratios(vProbeSets, iProbeSetCount, iWaveIndex, uiCelIndex);
00669             calibrateMedianAutosomeMedian(vProbeSets);
00670         }
00671 
00672         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Log2Ratios-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00673         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Value", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
00674         float f = 0;
00675         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00676         {
00677             f = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]->Log2Ratio;
00678             tsv5->set_f(0, 0, f);
00679             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00680         }
00681         tsv5->close();
00682         delete tsv5;
00683 
00684         if (iWaveIndex > 0)
00685         {
00686             if (m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex])
00687             {
00688                 loadMatrix(vProbeSets, vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes, uiSampleIndex, mxAutosomes);
00689                 uiSampleIndex++;
00690             }
00691             else
00692             {
00693                 Verbose::out(1, "Skipping this file because it failed QC, or because of the waviness-seg-count.");
00694             }
00695         }
00696     }
00697 
00698     if (iWaveIndex == 0)
00699     {
00700         Verbose::out(1, "Using " + ::getUnsignedInt(m_uiPassedQCCount) + " out of " + ::getUnsignedInt(uiCelCount) + " samples for this run.");
00701         if (((double)m_uiPassedQCCount / (double)uiCelCount) < 0.5)
00702         {
00703             Verbose::warn(1, "The percentage of samples failing due to QC or waviness-seg-count is >= 50%.");
00704         }
00705         v.nullAll();
00706         vProbeSetsNameOrder.nullAll();
00707         delete[] pv;
00708         if (m_uiPassedQCCount == 0) {Err::errAbort("No samples are valid for this run.");}
00709 
00710         mxAutosomes.ReSize(iAutosomeProcessCount, m_uiPassedQCCount);
00711         unsigned int uiSampleIndex = 0;
00712         for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00713         {
00714             if (m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex])
00715             {
00716                 float f = 0;
00717                 affx::File5_Tsv* ptsv5 = group5->openTsv("Log2Ratios-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00718                 for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00719                 {
00720                     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
00721                     ptsv5->nextLine();
00722                     ptsv5->get(0, 0, &f);
00723                     p->Log2Ratio = f;
00724                 }
00725                 ptsv5->close();
00726                 delete ptsv5;
00727                 loadMatrix(vProbeSets, vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes, uiSampleIndex, mxAutosomes);
00728                 uiSampleIndex++;
00729             }
00730         }
00731     }
00732 
00733     if (m_bDemean)
00734     {
00735         for (int y = 0; (y < mxAutosomes.Nrows()); y++)
00736         {
00737             double dAutosomeMean = 0;
00738             for (int x = 0; (x < mxAutosomes.Ncols()); x++)
00739             {
00740                 dAutosomeMean += mxAutosomes.element(y, x);
00741             }
00742             dAutosomeMean /= (double)mxAutosomes.Ncols();
00743             for (int x = 0; (x < mxAutosomes.Ncols()); x++)
00744             {
00745                 mxAutosomes.element(y, x) -= dAutosomeMean;
00746             }
00747         }
00748     }
00749 
00750     Matrix mxAutosomePrincipalComponent(vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes.size(), 1);
00751     Matrix mxAutosomeLog2Ratios(vAutosomeProbeSetIndexes.size(), 1);
00752     Matrix mxU; DiagonalMatrix mxS;
00753 
00754     SVD(mxAutosomes, mxS, mxU);
00755 
00756     CNAnalysisMethod::memory("CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::svd(...)");
00757     for (int y = 0; (y < mxAutosomes.Nrows()); y++)
00758     {
00759         mxAutosomePrincipalComponent.element(y, 0) = mxU.element(y, 0);
00760     }
00761 //    Verbose::out(1, "*");
00762     uiSampleIndex = 0;
00763     for (int x = 0; (x < uiCelCount); x++)
00764     {
00765         if (m_vPassedQC[x])
00766         {
00767             for (int y = 0; (y < mxAutosomes.Nrows()); y++)
00768             {
00769                 mxAutosomeLog2Ratios.element(y, 0) = mxAutosomes.element(y, uiSampleIndex);
00770             }
00771             m_vAutosomeCV[x] = corr(mxAutosomePrincipalComponent, mxAutosomeLog2Ratios);
00772     //        Verbose::out(1, ::getInt(x + 1) + "\t" + ::getDouble(m_vAutosomeCV[x], 6));
00773             uiSampleIndex++;
00774         }
00775     }
00776 //    Verbose::out(1, "*");
00777     Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::loadPCALikeVector(...) Step " + ToStr(iWaveIndex) + " Calculating wave removal");
00778     affx::File5_Tsv** pptsv5 = new affx::File5_Tsv*[uiCelCount];
00779     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00780     {
00781         pptsv5[uiCelIndex] = group5->openTsv("Log2Ratios-" + ::getInt(uiCelIndex), affx::FILE5_OPEN_RO);
00782     }
00783     Matrix mx(iProbeSetCount, 1);
00784     float f = 0;
00785     double* pValues = new double[uiCelCount];
00786     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00787     {
00788         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
00789         int iCount = 0;
00790         if (p->Chromosome == m_iXChromosome)
00791         {
00792             for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00793             {
00794                 if (m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex])
00795                 {
00796                     pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->nextLine();
00797                     pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 0, &f);
00798                     if (m_vAutosomeCV[uiCelIndex] < 0) {f *= -1;}
00799                     if (m_vHasXX[uiCelIndex]) {pValues[iCount] = f; iCount++;}
00800                 }
00801             }
00802         }
00803         else if (p->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome)
00804         {
00805             for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00806             {
00807                 if (m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex])
00808                 {
00809                     pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->nextLine();
00810                     pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 0, &f);
00811                     if (m_vHasY[uiCelIndex])
00812                     {
00813                         f -= m_vYTargets[uiCelIndex];
00814                         if (m_vAutosomeCV[uiCelIndex] < 0) {f *= -1;}
00815                         pValues[iCount] = f; iCount++;
00816                     }
00817                 }
00818             }
00819         }
00820         else // Autosome
00821         {
00822             for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00823             {
00824                 if (m_vPassedQC[uiCelIndex])
00825                 {
00826                     pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->nextLine();
00827                     pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->get(0, 0, &f);
00828                     if (m_vAutosomeCV[uiCelIndex] < 0) {f *= -1;}
00829                     pValues[iCount] = f; iCount++;
00830                 }
00831             }
00832         }
00833         if (iCount == 0) {mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0) = 0;}
00834         else
00835         {
00836             double dLowPercentile = percentile((1.0 - m_dPercentile) * 100, pValues, iCount);
00837             double dHighPercentile = percentile(m_dPercentile * 100, pValues, iCount);
00838 
00839             double dDiff = fabs(fabs(dLowPercentile) - fabs(dHighPercentile));
00840             if ((dDiff < m_dWaveCutoff) || (fabs(dHighPercentile) > fabs(dLowPercentile)))
00841             {
00842                 mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0) = dHighPercentile;
00843             }
00844             else
00845             {
00846                 mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0) = dLowPercentile;
00847             }
00848             if (mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0) != mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0)) {mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0) = 0;}
00849         }
00850     }
00851     delete[] pValues;
00852     for (unsigned int uiCelIndex = 0; (uiCelIndex < uiCelCount); uiCelIndex++)
00853     {
00854         pptsv5[uiCelIndex]->close();
00855         delete pptsv5[uiCelIndex];
00856     }
00857     delete[] pptsv5;
00858 
00859     group5->close();
00860     delete group5;
00861     file5.close();
00862 
00863     // Normalize
00864     double dNorm = norm(mx);
00865     mx /= dNorm;
00866 
00867     // Orthogonalize
00868     int iTotalWaveIndex = m_iRefWaveCount + iWaveIndex;
00869     std::vector<double> vSums;
00870     vSums.resize(iProbeSetCount);
00871     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00872     {
00873         vSums[iProbeSetIndex] = 0;
00874     }
00875     for (int iWave = 0; (iWave < iTotalWaveIndex); iWave++)
00876     {
00877         double dSum = 0;
00878         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00879         {
00880             dSum += vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]->Waves[iWave] * mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0);
00881         }
00882         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00883         {
00884             vSums[iProbeSetIndex] += dSum * vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]->Waves[iWave];
00885         }
00886     }
00887     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00888     {
00889         mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0) -= vSums[iProbeSetIndex];
00890     }
00891     // Normalize
00892     dNorm = norm(mx);
00893     mx /= dNorm;
00894 
00895     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
00896     {
00897         vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]->Waves[iTotalWaveIndex] = mx.element(iProbeSetIndex, 0);
00898     }
00899 }
00900 
00901 // TODO: This needs to be templatized and moved to CNAnalysisMethod.h
00902 // to avoid cloning CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::run()
00903 //
00904 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::covariateAdjustLog2Ratio(AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets, unsigned int uiCelIndex)
00905 {
00906     if (!m_pEngine->isOptDefined("lr-adjustment-covariates")) {return;}
00907     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("lr-adjustment-covariates") == "none") {return;}
00908     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("lr-adjustment-covariates") == "") {return;}
00909     int numCovariates = CovariateParams::m_vLRCovariates.size();
00910     if (numCovariates == 0)
00911     {
00912         return;
00913     }
00914 
00915     // Check if any covariate values were read from the annotation file or covariates file
00916     if (vProbeSets.size() > 0 && vProbeSets[0]->AllCovariates.size() == 0)
00917     {
00918         if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("disable-covariates-file-warning") == false)
00919         {
00920             Verbose::warn(1, "Covariate adjustment is disabled. No covariate values were loaded. annotation-file does not support covariates.");
00921             m_pEngine->setOpt("disable-covariates-file-warning", "true");
00922         }
00923         return;
00924     }
00925 
00926     const float IQRepsilon = 1.0e-10;
00927 
00928     Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::covariateAdjustLog2Ratio()...");
00929     if (m_pvExperiments != NULL) m_pobjExperiment = m_pvExperiments->getAt(uiCelIndex);
00930     int iXChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("xChromosome");
00931     int iYChromosome = m_pEngine->getOptInt("yChromosome");
00932     int validProcessFlags[] = { 1, 3 };      // CN and SNP, resp.
00933 
00934     // Find out if marker-class is one of the covariates
00935     int markerClassIndex = CovariateParams::mapCovariateNameToIndex("marker-class");
00936 
00937     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data")) {
00938         writeWaveCorrectionLog2Ratios("WCBeforeCovariateAdjust", vProbeSets);
00939     }
00940 
00941     for (int iCovariateIndex = 0; iCovariateIndex < numCovariates; iCovariateIndex++)
00942     {
00943         int iTransIndex = CovariateParams::m_vLRCovariates[iCovariateIndex];
00944         int maxFlagIndex = 2;      // the default number of marker classes (i.e. SNP and CN)
00945         if (markerClassIndex == iTransIndex)
00946         {
00947             // This is the marker-class covariate, so do not distinguish SNP and CN in what follows
00948             maxFlagIndex = 1;      // do the loop below only once (i.e. it's one class of markers)
00949         }
00950         for (int iFlagIndex = 0; iFlagIndex < maxFlagIndex; iFlagIndex++)
00951         {
00952             string intermSuffix;
00953             if (maxFlagIndex == 1) {
00954                 intermSuffix = "_MARKER_CLASS";
00955             } else if (validProcessFlags[iFlagIndex] == 1) {
00956                 intermSuffix = "_CN";
00957             } else if (validProcessFlags[iFlagIndex] == 3) {
00958                 intermSuffix = "_SNP";
00959             } else {
00960                 intermSuffix = "_INVALID_FLAG";
00961             }
00962 
00963             vector<float> covariates;
00964             vector<int> probeSetsToProcess;
00965     
00966             // NB: local probe sets of CNAnalysisMethodLog2Ratio (process flag = 1 or 3)
00967             for (int iPSIndex = 0; iPSIndex < vProbeSets.size(); iPSIndex++)
00968             {
00969                 CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet *pset = vProbeSets[iPSIndex];
00970                 float covValue = pset->getCovariateValue(iTransIndex);
00971     
00972                 if ((maxFlagIndex == 1 || pset->getProcessFlag() == validProcessFlags[iFlagIndex]) &&
00973                     covValue == covValue)
00974                 {
00975                     covariates.push_back(covValue);
00976                     probeSetsToProcess.push_back(iPSIndex);
00977                 }
00978             }
00979             vector<int> binning(covariates.size());
00980             int numBins = CNAnalysisMethodCovariateLRAdjuster::determineBins(covariates, binning, iCovariateIndex);
00981     
00982             // Adjust log2 ratios
00983             vector<float> mediansLR(numBins);
00984             vector<float> IQRanges(numBins);
00985             for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
00986             {
00987                 // Find bin median of autosome log2 ratios
00988                 vector<float> log2ratios;
00989                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < probeSetsToProcess.size(); iIndex++)
00990                 {
00991                     if (binning[iIndex] == iBinIndex)
00992                     {
00993                         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet *pset = vProbeSets[probeSetsToProcess[iIndex]];
00994                         if (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome)
00995                         {
00996                             if (pset->getLog2Ratio() == pset->getLog2Ratio())
00997                             {
00998                                 log2ratios.push_back(pset->getLog2Ratio());
00999                             }
01000                         }
01001                     }                        
01002                 }
01003                 int binSize = log2ratios.size();
01004                 if (binSize == 0)
01005                 {
01006                     mediansLR[iBinIndex] = 0.0;
01007                     IQRanges[iBinIndex] = numeric_limits<float>::quiet_NaN();   // invalid value to flag an empty bin
01008                     continue;
01009                 }
01010                 std::nth_element(log2ratios.begin(), log2ratios.begin() + binSize/2, log2ratios.end());
01011                 mediansLR[iBinIndex] = log2ratios[binSize/2];
01012     
01013                 std::nth_element(log2ratios.begin(), log2ratios.begin() + binSize/4, log2ratios.end());
01014                 float lowerQuartile = log2ratios[binSize/4];
01015     
01016                 std::nth_element(log2ratios.begin(), log2ratios.begin() + 3*binSize/4, log2ratios.end());
01017                 IQRanges[iBinIndex] = log2ratios[3*binSize/4] - lowerQuartile;
01018             }
01019         
01020             bool subtractMedianFromXY = (CovariateParams::m_vLRSubractFromXY[iCovariateIndex] == "on");
01021     
01022             // Subtract the medians from markers in this bin (including X and Y)
01023             for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < probeSetsToProcess.size(); iIndex++)
01024             {
01025                 CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet *pset = vProbeSets[probeSetsToProcess[iIndex]];
01026                 if (subtractMedianFromXY || (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome))
01027                 {
01028                     if (pset->getLog2Ratio() == pset->getLog2Ratio())
01029                     {
01030                         pset->setLog2Ratio(pset->getLog2Ratio() - mediansLR[binning[iIndex]]);
01031                     }
01032                 }
01033             }
01034     
01035             // If requested, perform IQR scaling
01036             if (CovariateParams::m_vIQRScaling[iCovariateIndex] == "on")
01037             {
01038                 vector<float> validIQRanges;
01039                 for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
01040                 {
01041                     if (IQRanges[iBinIndex] == IQRanges[iBinIndex])
01042                     {
01043                         validIQRanges.push_back(IQRanges[iBinIndex]);
01044                     }
01045                 }
01046                 int numValidRanges = validIQRanges.size();
01047                 std::nth_element(validIQRanges.begin(), validIQRanges.begin() + numValidRanges/2, validIQRanges.end());
01048                 float medianIQRange = validIQRanges[numValidRanges/2];
01049     
01050                 vector<float> scalingFactors(numBins);
01051                 for (int iBinIndex = 0; iBinIndex < numBins; iBinIndex++)
01052                 {
01053                     if(IQRanges[iBinIndex] == IQRanges[iBinIndex])
01054                     {
01055                         if (IQRanges[iBinIndex] < IQRepsilon)
01056                         {
01057                             scalingFactors[iBinIndex] = 1.0;
01058                         }
01059                         else {
01060                             scalingFactors[iBinIndex] = medianIQRange/IQRanges[iBinIndex];
01061                         }
01062                     }
01063                 }
01064     
01065                 for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex < probeSetsToProcess.size(); iIndex++)
01066                 {
01067                     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet *pset = vProbeSets[probeSetsToProcess[iIndex]];
01068     
01069                     // Turn off iqr-scaling for X/Y if subtractMedianFromXY == false - per Ben 1/28/2011
01070                     if (subtractMedianFromXY || (pset->getChromosome() != iXChromosome && pset->getChromosome() != iYChromosome))
01071                     {
01072                         if (pset->getLog2Ratio() == pset->getLog2Ratio())
01073                         {
01074                             pset->setLog2Ratio(pset->getLog2Ratio() * scalingFactors[binning[iIndex]]);
01075                         }
01076                     }
01077                 }
01078             }
01079             if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
01080             {
01081                 writeWaveCorrectionLog2Ratios("WCAfterCovariateAdjust_" + Convert::toString(iCovariateIndex+1) + intermSuffix, vProbeSets);
01082                 writeMediansVector("WCCovariateL2rMedians_" + Convert::toString(iCovariateIndex+1) + intermSuffix, mediansLR);
01083             }
01084         }
01085     }
01086 }
01087 
01088 // Subtract residuals from Log2 Ratios.
01089 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::adjustLog2Ratios(AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets, int iProbeSetCount, int iWaveIndex, unsigned int uiCelIndex)
01090 {
01091     double dSum = 0;
01092     double dTempNorm = 0;
01093     if (iWaveIndex > 0)
01094     {
01095         Matrix mxTemp(m_iAutosomeCount, 1);
01096         int iTempIndex = 0;
01097         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
01098         {
01099             CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex];
01100             if (p->Chromosome <= m_iLastAutosomeChromosome)
01101             {
01102                 dSum += (p->Waves[m_iRefWaveCount + iWaveIndex - 1] * p->Log2Ratio);
01103                 mxTemp.element(iTempIndex, 0) = p->Waves[m_iRefWaveCount + iWaveIndex - 1]; iTempIndex++;
01104             }
01105         }
01106         dTempNorm = norm(mxTemp);
01107         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < iProbeSetCount); iProbeSetIndex++)
01108         {
01109                 vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]->Log2Ratio -= (dSum * vProbeSets[iProbeSetIndex]->Waves[m_iRefWaveCount + iWaveIndex - 1] / dTempNorm);
01110         }
01111 
01112         if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method")     &&
01113             m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != "none" &&
01114             m_pEngine->getOpt("wave-correction-log2ratio-adjustment-method") != ""     &&
01115             getExperiment())
01116         {
01117             getExperiment()->addWavinessAmplitude(iWaveIndex, dSum/dTempNorm);
01118         }
01119     }
01120 }
01121 
01122 /**
01123  * Get the last autosome chromosome. As defined by being the last chromosome before the X chromosome value.
01124  * @return int - The chromosome number
01125  */
01126 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::calculateChromosomeStatistics(AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets)
01127 {
01128     m_iXChromosomeCount = 0;
01129     m_iYChromosomeCount = 0;
01130     m_iAutosomeCount = 0;
01131     m_iLastAutosomeChromosome = 1;
01132     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < vProbeSets.size()); iIndex++)
01133     {
01134         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = vProbeSets[iIndex];
01135         if (p->Chromosome == m_iXChromosome) {m_iXChromosomeCount++;}
01136         else if (p->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome) {m_iYChromosomeCount++;}
01137         else if (p->Chromosome < m_iXChromosome)
01138         {
01139             m_iAutosomeCount++;
01140             m_iLastAutosomeChromosome = Max(m_iLastAutosomeChromosome, (int)p->Chromosome);
01141         }
01142     }
01143 }
01144 /**
01145  * Calcuate the median autosome median. This is used to normalize the log2 ratios.
01146  */
01147 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::calibrateMedianAutosomeMedian(AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets)
01148 {
01149     int iProbeSetCount = vProbeSets.size();
01150     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vChrCounts(m_iLastAutosomeChromosome);
01151     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<int> vChrIndexes(m_iLastAutosomeChromosome);
01152     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vChrMedians(m_iLastAutosomeChromosome);
01153     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>* pvar = new AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float>[m_iLastAutosomeChromosome];
01154     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < iProbeSetCount); iRowIndex++)
01155     {
01156         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets[iRowIndex];
01157         if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome <= 0) {continue;}
01158         if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome <= m_iLastAutosomeChromosome)
01159         {
01160             vChrCounts.increment(pobjProbeSet->Chromosome - 1);
01161         }
01162     }
01163     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_iLastAutosomeChromosome); iIndex++)
01164     {
01165         pvar[iIndex].initialize(vChrCounts.get(iIndex));
01166     }
01167     vChrIndexes.initialize();
01168     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < iProbeSetCount); iRowIndex++)
01169     {
01170         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets[iRowIndex];
01171         if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome <= 0) {continue;}
01172         if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome <= m_iLastAutosomeChromosome)
01173         {
01174             pvar[pobjProbeSet->Chromosome - 1].set(vChrIndexes.get(pobjProbeSet->Chromosome - 1), pobjProbeSet->Log2Ratio);
01175             vChrIndexes.increment(pobjProbeSet->Chromosome - 1);
01176         }
01177     }
01178     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < m_iLastAutosomeChromosome); iIndex++)
01179     {
01180         vChrMedians.set(iIndex, (float)pvar[iIndex].median());
01181     }
01182     double dMedianAutosomeMedian = vChrMedians.finiteMedian();
01183     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < iProbeSetCount); iRowIndex++)
01184     {
01185         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets[iRowIndex];
01186         pobjProbeSet->Log2Ratio = (float)(pobjProbeSet->Log2Ratio - dMedianAutosomeMedian);
01187     }
01188     delete[] pvar;
01189 }
01190 
01191 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::calculateXY(AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets, int iProbeSetCount, bool& bXX, bool& bY)
01192 {
01193     AffxArray<AffxString> vYProbeSetsToProcess;
01194 
01195     affx::TsvFile tsv;
01196     tsv.m_optAutoTrim = true;
01197 
01198     if ( tsv.open(m_pEngine->getOpt("chrY-probes")) == affx::TSV_OK ) {
01199         AffxString strProbeSetName;
01200         while (tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
01201             tsv.get(0,1, strProbeSetName);
01202             if (!strProbeSetName.empty()) {
01203                 vYProbeSetsToProcess.add(new AffxString(strProbeSetName));
01204             }
01205         }
01206         tsv.clear();
01207     }
01208 
01209     vYProbeSetsToProcess.quickSort(0);
01210 
01211     bXX = false;
01212     bY = false;
01213     // Allocate the data vectors.
01214     int iChrRefCount = 0;
01215     int iChrXCount = 0;
01216     int iChrYCount = 0;
01217     for (int uiRowIndex = 0; (uiRowIndex < iProbeSetCount); uiRowIndex++)
01218     {
01219         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets[uiRowIndex];
01220         if ((pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome) && (vYProbeSetsToProcess.getCount() > 0) && (vYProbeSetsToProcess.binarySearch(pobjProbeSet->ProbeSetName, 0) == -1)) {continue;}
01221         if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_pEngine->getOptInt("reference-chromosome")) {iChrRefCount++;}
01222         else if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_iXChromosome) {iChrXCount++;}
01223         else if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome) {iChrYCount++;}
01224     }
01225     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vChrRefMedian(iChrRefCount);
01226     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vChrXSignal(iChrXCount);
01227     AffxMultiDimensionalArray<float> vChrYSignal(iChrYCount);
01228 
01229     int iChrRefIndex = 0;
01230     int iChrXIndex = 0;
01231     int iChrYIndex = 0;
01232     // For each probe set load the relevant data into the vectors so we can calculate the median.
01233     for (int iRowIndex = 0; (iRowIndex < iProbeSetCount); iRowIndex++)
01234     {
01235         CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = vProbeSets[iRowIndex];
01236         if ((pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome) && (vYProbeSetsToProcess.getCount() > 0) && (vYProbeSetsToProcess.binarySearch(pobjProbeSet->ProbeSetName, 0) == -1)) {continue;}
01237         if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_pEngine->getOptInt("reference-chromosome"))
01238         {
01239             vChrRefMedian.set(iChrRefIndex, pobjProbeSet->MedianSignal);
01240             iChrRefIndex++;
01241         }
01242         else if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_iXChromosome)
01243         {
01244             vChrXSignal.set(iChrXIndex, pobjProbeSet->Signal);
01245             iChrXIndex++;
01246         }
01247         else if (pobjProbeSet->Chromosome == m_iYChromosome)
01248         {
01249             vChrYSignal.set(iChrYIndex, pobjProbeSet->Signal);
01250             iChrYIndex++;
01251         }
01252     }
01253     vYProbeSetsToProcess.deleteAll();
01254     double dChrRefMedian = vChrRefMedian.median();
01255 
01256     // Set the experiment hasXX value.
01257     double dXXRatio = (vChrXSignal.median() / dChrRefMedian);
01258     bXX = ((dXXRatio > m_pEngine->getOptDouble("xx-cutoff")) && (dXXRatio < m_pEngine->getOptDouble("xx-cutoff-high")));
01259 
01260     // Set the experiment hasY value.
01261     double dYRatio = (vChrYSignal.median() / dChrRefMedian);
01262     bY = (dYRatio > m_pEngine->getOptDouble("y-cutoff"));
01263 
01264     Verbose::out(1, "CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::calculateXY(...)\tXXRatio\t" + ::getDouble(dXXRatio, 6) + "\tYRatio\t" + ::getDouble(dYRatio, 6) + "\t" + (bXX ? "XX" : "X") + (bY ? "Y" : ""));
01265 }
01266 
01267 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::loadMatrix(       AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets,
01268                                                         std::vector<int>& vProbeSetIndexes,
01269                                                         unsigned int uiSampleIndex,
01270                                                         Matrix& mx)
01271 {
01272     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < vProbeSetIndexes.size()); iIndex++)
01273     {
01274         float fLog2Ratio = vProbeSets[vProbeSetIndexes[iIndex]]->Log2Ratio;
01275         if (fLog2Ratio > m_dTrim) {fLog2Ratio = (float)m_dTrim;}
01276         else if (fLog2Ratio < -m_dTrim) {fLog2Ratio = (float)-m_dTrim;}
01277         if (fLog2Ratio != fLog2Ratio)
01278         {
01279             throw(Except("NaN Log2Ratios found in data."));
01280         }
01281         mx.element(iIndex, uiSampleIndex) = fLog2Ratio;
01282     }
01283 }
01284 
01285 double CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::corr(Matrix& mx1, Matrix& mx2)
01286 {
01287     ColumnVector v1 = mx1.AsColumn();
01288     ColumnVector v2 = mx2.AsColumn();
01289     if (v1.Nrows() != v2.Nrows()) {return std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN();}
01290     int iLength = v1.Nrows();
01291     double dSum = 0;
01292     for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
01293     {
01294         dSum += v1.element(iElementIndex);
01295     }
01296     double m1 = (dSum / (double)iLength);
01297     dSum = 0;
01298     for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
01299     {
01300         dSum += v2.element(iElementIndex);
01301     }
01302     double m2 = (dSum / (double)iLength);
01303     double dNumerator = 0;
01304     double d1 = 0;;
01305     double d2 = 0;
01306     for (int iElementIndex = 0; (iElementIndex < iLength); iElementIndex++)
01307     {
01308         dNumerator += (v1.element(iElementIndex) - m1) * (v2.element(iElementIndex) - m2);
01309         d1 += (v1.element(iElementIndex) - m1) * (v1.element(iElementIndex) - m1) ;
01310         d2 += (v2.element(iElementIndex) - m2) * (v2.element(iElementIndex) - m2) ;
01311     }
01312     double dDenominator = sqrt(d1 * d2);
01313     return dNumerator / dDenominator;
01314 }
01315 /*
01316 double CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::norm(Matrix& v)
01317 {
01318     DiagonalMatrix D;
01319     SVD(v, D);
01320     return D.Maximum();
01321 }
01322 */
01323 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::updateReference(AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets, int iTotalProbeSetCount)
01324 {
01325     int iWaveCount = m_iRefWaveCount + m_iWaveCount;
01326     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input"))
01327     {
01328         Fs::fileCopy(m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-input"), m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-output"));
01329     }
01330 
01331     vProbeSets.quickSort(0);
01332 
01333     affx::File5_File file5;
01334     affx::File5_Group* group5 = NULL;
01335     affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
01336     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input"))
01337     {
01338         file5.open(m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-output"), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01339     }
01340     else
01341     {
01342         file5.open(m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-output"), affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01343     }
01344     group5 = file5.openGroup(m_strGroup, affx::FILE5_OPEN);
01345 
01346     tsv5 = group5->openTsv("WaveCorrection", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01347     for (int iWaveIndex = 0; (iWaveIndex < iWaveCount); iWaveIndex++)
01348     {
01349         tsv5->defineColumn(0, iWaveIndex, "X" + ToStr(iWaveIndex + 1), affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
01350     }
01351     int iIndex = 0;
01352     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* p = NULL;
01353     for (int iFullIndex = 0; (iFullIndex < iTotalProbeSetCount); iFullIndex++)
01354     {
01355         if (iIndex < vProbeSets.size()) {p = vProbeSets[iIndex];}
01356         if ((p != NULL) && (p->Order == iFullIndex))
01357         {
01358             for (int iWaveIndex = 0; (iWaveIndex < (int)p->Waves.size()); iWaveIndex++)
01359             {
01360                 tsv5->set_d(0, iWaveIndex, p->Waves[iWaveIndex]);
01361             }
01362             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01363             iIndex++;
01364         }
01365         else
01366         {
01367             for (int iWaveIndex = 0; (iWaveIndex < iWaveCount); iWaveIndex++)
01368             {
01369                 tsv5->set_d(0, iWaveIndex, std::numeric_limits<double>::quiet_NaN());
01370             }
01371             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01372         }
01373     }
01374 
01375     tsv5->close();
01376     delete tsv5;
01377 
01378     if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cn-reference-input"))
01379     {
01380         tsv5 = group5->openTsv("AdditionalWavesParameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01381         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Parameter", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 1024);
01382 
01383         // dump options.
01384         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome=" + ::getInt(m_iXChromosome)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01385         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome=" + ::getInt(m_iYChromosome)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01386         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-analysis=" + m_pEngine->getOpt("analysis")); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01387         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cn-reference-input=" + Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-input"))); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01388         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-state-existing-wave-count=" + ::getInt(m_iRefWaveCount)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01389         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cn-reference-output=" + Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOpt("cn-reference-output"))); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01390         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-additional-wave-count=" + ::getInt(m_iWaveCount)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01391         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-trim=" + ::getDouble(m_dTrim, 6)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01392         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-percentile=" + ::getDouble(m_dPercentile, 6)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01393         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-demean=" + std::string(((m_bDemean) ? "true" : "false"))); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01394         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cn-qc-cutoff=" + ::getDouble(m_dCNQCCutoff, 6)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01395         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-snp-qc-cutoff=" + ::getDouble(m_dSNPQCCutoff, 6)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01396         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-waviness-seg-count-cutoff=" + ::getInt(m_iWavinessSegCountCutoff)); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01397         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-use-high-waviness-seg-count=" + std::string(((m_bUseHighWavinessSegCount) ? "true" : "false"))); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01398         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-force=" + std::string(((m_bForce) ? "true" : "false"))); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01399         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-keep-temp-data=" + std::string(((m_bKeepTempData) ? "true" : "false"))); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01400         for (unsigned int ui = 0; (ui < m_pEngine->getOptVector("cychps").size()); ui++)
01401         {
01402             if (m_vPassedQC[ui])
01403             {
01404                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-cychps-" + ::getUnsignedInt(ui + 1) + "=" + Fs::basename(m_pEngine->getOptVector("cychps")[ui])); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01405             }
01406         }
01407 
01408         tsv5->close();
01409         delete tsv5;
01410     }
01411 
01412     group5->close();
01413     delete group5;
01414     file5.close();
01415 }
01416 
01417 void CNReferenceMethodWaveCorrection::writeWaveCorrectionLog2Ratios(std::string l2rFileInfix, AffxArray<CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet>& vProbeSets)
01418 {
01419   affx::File5_File file5;
01420   affx::File5_Group* group5;
01421   affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = NULL;
01422 
01423   // Self preservation
01424   // TODO: Fix this.
01425   if (getExperiment() == NULL) return;
01426 
01427   std::string analysisString = "analysis";
01428   std::string strExperimentName = getExperiment()->getExperimentName();
01429   std::string fileName = Fs::join(getEngine()->getOpt("out-dir"),
01430                                   analysisString,
01431                                   strExperimentName + "." + l2rFileInfix + ".l2r.a5");
01432   
01433   std::string dirName = Fs::join(getEngine()->getOpt("out-dir"), analysisString);  
01434 
01435 
01436   Verbose::out(3, "Writing Log2Ratios for " + fileName);
01437 
01438   try{
01439 
01440 
01441     if(!Fs::dirExists(dirName))
01442     {
01443         Fs::mkdir(dirName, false);
01444     }
01445 
01446     file5.open(fileName, affx::FILE5_CREATE | affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01447     group5 = file5.openGroup("Signals", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01448     tsv5 = group5->openTsv("Signals", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
01449     tsv5->defineColumn(0,0,"ProbeSetName", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING,40);
01450     tsv5->defineColumn(0,1,"Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_CHAR);
01451     tsv5->defineColumn(0,2,"Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
01452     tsv5->defineColumn(0,3,"Log2Ratio", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT);
01453 
01454     CNWaveCorrectionProbeSet* pProbeSet;
01455     for(int iProbeSetIndex=0;  iProbeSetIndex < vProbeSets.getCount(); iProbeSetIndex++)
01456     {
01457       pProbeSet = vProbeSets.getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
01458       tsv5->set_string(0,0, pProbeSet->ProbeSetName);
01459       tsv5->set_c(0,1, pProbeSet->Chromosome);
01460       tsv5->set_i(0,2, pProbeSet->Position);
01461       tsv5->set_f(0,3, (float)pProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
01462       tsv5->writeLevel(0);
01463     }
01464 
01465     tsv5->close();
01466     delete tsv5;
01467     delete group5;
01468     file5.close();
01469 
01470   }
01471   catch(...){ throw(Except("Cannot open file " + fileName + " while attempting to dump intensities to file."));}
